title: Back to the Future Rumors and Predictions
subtitle: On "Back to the Future" day, a variety of rumors about BTTF's vision of life in 2015 were prominent on social media.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Multiple social media rumors circulated on Back to the Future Day (21 October 2015): that Michael J. Fox was arrested for "insider sports betting," that Nike delivered a pair of self-tying sneakers, and that the Biff Tannen character was based on Donald Trump.
